ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:40:28 [Issue ID 4000-96784] urn:comicvine:4000-96784 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:03:35. [Issue ID 214021]
ComicInfo.Summary: Class Action Comics!: Jen learns some valuable lessons with her first case at GLK&H, where Dan Jermain is suffering after becoming stronger and more powerful after accidentally being knocked into a vat of radioactive water at Roxxon and, instead of dying, morphs into some kind of atomic-powered strong man with super-powers.
ComicInfo.Title: Class Action Comics!
